alert.note: Alert for Prairie; Roosevelt; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 25 at 11:59PM MDT until further notice by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following counties, Garfield, McCone, Prairie, Roosevelt and Valley. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1158 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glasgow, Wolf Point, Circle, Jordan, Nashua, Fort Peck, Rock Creek Rec Area, Nelson Creek Rec Area, Frazer, Flowing Wells Rest Area, Fort Peck Marina, Duck Creek Rec Area, The Pines Rec Area, Brockway, Vida, Hell Creek Rec Area, Lustre, St. Marie, Cohagen and Hillside. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
